name: Christmas for the Unbelievers
description:
It's Santa's favorite time of the year again, it's Christmas! This year Santa has delivered present to good kids as he usually does, but it seems that nowadays kids many kids have stopped believing that he is real. So in order to remind them that he does really exist, he decided to bring presents to the unbelievers too this year! But that is no easy task, for these naughty kids had filled their home with traps, so that they will be sure there is no Santa, cause only ol'Santa can get trough the traps!

Controls:

A - move left          

D - move right 

W - jump 

M - mute/unmute music

Songs used in this game:

Jingle Bells 7 by Kevin MacLeod

Jingle Bells by Kevin MacLeod (Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100187)

Deck the Halls B by Kevin MacLeod(Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100368)

Artist: http://incompetech.com/ 

Canon and Variation by Twin Musicom

Artist: http://www.twinmusicom.org/

These songs are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

It is recommended to play this game in fullscreen ( press the down right button on the game window).
